entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
